component.name: Sheet
component.description: Slide-in overlay panel anchored to a screen edge for supplementary content, forms, or navigation without leaving the current page.

useCases: Side panel for editing a record's details
Filter or settings panel that overlays the main content
Multi-step forms that should not navigate away from the current view

commonPatterns.name: right-side-form
commonPatterns.description: A sheet sliding from the right with a header, scrollable body, and footer actions.

commonPatterns.name: bottom-sheet-mobile
commonPatterns.description: A bottom-anchored sheet for mobile action menus or confirmations.

antiPatterns.reason: Sheets slide in from an edge and can feel dismissable; critical confirmations need a centered, blocking dialog.
antiPatterns.alternative: Use AlertDialog for destructive or irreversible confirmations.

antiPatterns.reason: A full slide-in panel is excessive for a tooltip or a few-line popover.
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Popover or DropdownMenu for lightweight contextual overlays.

slots.SheetTrigger: The element that opens the sheet (use asChild for custom triggers)
slots.SheetContent: The panel container; accepts a side prop
slots.SheetHeader: Container for SheetTitle and SheetDescription at the top of the panel
slots.SheetBody: Scrollable main content area between header and footer
slots.SheetFooter: Sticky bottom bar for action buttons (reverses column order on mobile)
slots.SheetTitle: Accessible title text (required for screen readers)
slots.SheetDescription: Optional descriptive text below the title
slots.SheetClose: Wraps elements that should close the sheet on click

parentConstraints: Sheet is a root-level overlay; it portals to the document body via SheetPortal

interactions.open: Triggered by SheetTrigger click or controlled open prop
interactions.close: Click the X button, SheetClose element, overlay backdrop, or press Escape
interactions.scroll: SheetBody provides overflow-y scrolling for long content

responsive.mobile: Left/right sheets are 75% viewport width; bottom sheets slide up with rounded top corners; footer stacks buttons vertically
responsive.desktop: Left/right sheets cap at sm (24rem) max width; footer buttons are horizontal and right-aligned

accessibility.keyboardSupport: Escape closes the sheet; Tab traps focus within the open sheet; Shift+Tab cycles backwards
accessibility.screenReader: SheetTitle provides the accessible name; SheetDescription provides the accessible description; close button has 'Close' sr-only label
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus is trapped inside the sheet while open; returns to trigger element on close

rules: Always include SheetTitle inside SheetContent for accessibility
Use SheetBody for scrollable content to keep header and footer fixed
Prefer side='right' for detail/edit panels and side='bottom' for mobile action sheets
Do not nest sheets inside other sheets
alternatives: AlertDialog for destructive confirmations that require explicit user action
Popover for small contextual overlays anchored to a trigger
Tabs for switching content without an overlay

aiHints.context: Use Sheet when supplementary content (forms, details, navigation) should overlay the current page from an edge. It provides built-in header/body/footer structure, backdrop overlay, focus trapping, and slide animations for all four sides.
